ygData.msgSnippet:

as all get out. A full group at 45 pulling it to Lord is much more fun and
ygData.messageBody:
The SMR can be camped in a full group at 40, though IMO the camp is boring
as all get out. A full group at 45 pulling it to Lord is much more fun and
experience. Seen quite a few Ishva robes lately, full group at 40 should be
able to do it, but the Ishva is a 28 hour or so spawn, so do it if you have
a porter who can drop you in to north karana an hour or two before. Froglok
Bonecaster robes seem quite popular too, that's from a level 53 frog in Old
Sebilis. Me, I've been clearing Hate hoping some Insidious will drop. Got
gloves and boots, haven't seen a robe drop yet <sigh> .

Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~ 50 Cazic Thule

>
> Message: 1
> Date: Wed, 11 Oct 2000 13:05:04 -0600
> From: "Melinda" <warnock@...>
> Subject: new robe
>
> I am looking around for a new robe for my enchanter. I currently wear an
Oracle Robe. Originally I had thought to get a SMR, but am told there are
others to choose from these days that are as good or better.
>
> Can anyone give opinions on this? Also where to camp them and/or prices?
lvls of mobs?
>
> thanks,
>
> Calistaah Fyreblaze
> Veeshan
> lvl 34 hi elf ench
